movies.title: Shadow Kids
movies.plot: This family drama deals with a case of Munchhausen Syndrome by Proxy, a fabricated illness. Stephanie is an apparently happy single mother of two daughters, Therese and Agnes, although the latter suffers from chronic health problems. When Stephanie's sister Christiane visits them, Agnes collapses during a theater play at their school and later dies in a hospital. Due to Stephanie's odd behavior, Christiane tries to find out the truth about the death of her niece...
movies.simplePlot: This family drama deals with a case of Munchhausen Syndrome by Proxy, a fabricated illness. Stephanie is an apparently happy single mother of two daughters, Therese and Agnes, although the ...

biography.bio: Born 9 November 1965 in Stuttgart, Germany, she attended well-renowned Folkwang theater school in Essen from 1986 to 1989. She made her début at famous Schaubühne theater, Berlin in 1989, then moved to Schauspielhaus Bochum until 1992, then came back to the Schaubühne until 1995. Since then, she acted in a significant number of German TV productions and had remarkable (and award-winning) appearances in cinema films.
biography.name: Karoline Eichhorn

biography.bio: Beata Lehmann was born in 1965. She is an actress and producer, known for The Reader (2008), The Book Thief (2013) and Früher oder später (2007).
biography.name: Beata Lehmann

biography.bio: Amber Bongard was born on August 24, 1997 in Potsdam, Brandenburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for My Life in Orange (2011), Quatre minutes (2006) and Rendez-nous notre fille (2005).
biography.name: Amber Bongard

biography.placeOfBirth: Gablonz an der Neiße, Sudetenland, Germany [now Jablonec nad Nisou, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Christian Grashof was born on August 5, 1943 in Gablonz an der Neiße, Sudetenland, Germany. He is an actor, known for Mephisto (1981), Willenbrock (2005) and Für Lotte (2013).
biography.name: Christian Grashof

biography.bio: Renan Demirkan was born on June 12, 1955 in Ankara, Turkey. She is an actress, known for Dr. Klein (2014), Scene of the Crime: A Tooth for a Tooth (1985) and Reise in die Nacht (1998).
biography.name: Renan Demirkan

biography.bio: Michael Gerber was born on February 10, 1943 in Germany. He is an actor, known for The Lives of Others (2006), Good Bye Lenin! (2003) and Lola and Billy the Kid (1999).
biography.name: Michael Gerber

biography.bio: Lucas Korn is an actor, known for Wie erziehe ich meine Eltern? (2010) and Shadow Kids (2007).
biography.name: Lucas Korn

biography.bio: Bettina Scheuritzel was born on October 5, 1968 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for The Reader (2008), Meine Tochter Anne Frank (2015) and 8 ½ Women (1999).
biography.name: Bettina Scheuritzel

biography.bio: Luzie Scheuritzel was born in September 1995. She is an actress, known for A Cure for Wellness (2016) and Shadow Kids (2007).
biography.name: Luzie Scheuritzel

biography.bio: Sammy Scheuritzel was born in August 1998 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Goodbye Berlin (2016), Vic le Viking (2009) and Things Left Unsaid (2017).
biography.name: Sammy Scheuritzel

biography.bio: Luise Tabea von Cossart was born on March 15, 1997 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for Feelings and Stuff (2008), Shadow Kids (2007) and Le temps des cerises (2007).
biography.name: Luise Tabea von Cossart
